title: BRIEF-India's JSW Promoter Group Repays 12 Bln Rupees Worth Loan By Releasing JSW Steel, JSW Energy Pledged Shares
text:
BRIEF-India's JSW Promoter Group Repays 12 Bln Rupees Worth Loan By Releasing JSW Steel, JSW Energy Pledged Shares

Stock Markets 30 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 14:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's JSW Promoter Group Repays 12 Bln Rupees Worth Loan By Releasing JSW Steel, JSW Energy Pledged Shares Oct 15 (Reuters) - INDIA'S JSW PROMOTER GROUP: * REPAYS 12 BILLION RUPEES WORTH LOAN BY RELEASING JSW STEEL, JSW ENERGY PLEDGED SHARES Further company coverage: JSTL.NS
